articles.author: Kocha Olarn, Rhea Mogul
articles.title: Thailand launches airstrikes on Cambodia as Trump’s peace agreement hangs in balance - CNN
articles.description: Thailand launched air strikes against Cambodia on Monday as a new wave of fighting erupted between the southeast Asian neighbors, marking the potential collapse of a peace plan presided over by US President Donald Trump just two months ago.
articles.content: Thailand launched airstrikes against Cambodia on Monday as a new wave of fighting erupted between the southeast Asian neighbors, leaving a peace plan presided over by US President Donald Trump just t… [+4143 chars]

articles.author: Vatican News
articles.title: Pope Leo XIV prays for victims of floods in Southeast Asia - Vatican News
articles.description: Pope Leo XIV expresses his closeness and assures his prayers for the millions of people affected by heavy flooding in various parts of Southeast Asia in recent weeks.
articles.content:
By Devin Watkins
Over 1,500 people have been killed in recent days in several parts of Southeast Asia due to catastrophic floods and landslides.
